latest_revision.text:
*'''Station Champions:''' Shaundra Newstead
*'''Communication:''' Slack #biochem channel
*'''Certification:''' Ask before using any equipment for a checkout
*'''Events:''' None

==Overview==
Before using equipment ask via Slack to get help learning the basics of the tools in the lab.

==Tools==
*research microscope
*Mettler Toledo AE160 Analytical Balance
*microbiology microscope with camera
*incubator
*VWR Galaxy 16DH Microcentrifuge
*consumables (test tubes, stains, etc)
*laminar flowhood (soon)
*chemical fumehood (soon)
*ring stands
*glassware
*distillation equipment
*Scilogex MS-H-S Analog Circular Magnetic Hotplate Stirrer
*MJ Research PTC-100 PCR Programmable Thermal Controller

==Supplies==
List needed

==Other==
* There is a [https://americanlaboratorytrading.com/lab-equipment-products/branson-b3200r-1-ultrasonic-cleaner_8951 Branson B3200 Ultrasonic Cleaner] in the Jewelry Station which can be used and put back there. [https://www.proequip.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/Bransonic_manual_1200-2200-3200-5200-8200.pdf manual]
